channel.title: CVE Feed for ABB -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ABB -- all products

item.title: CVE-2020-8482|2024-08-04T10:03:45.846Z -- abb -- abb%20device%20library%20wizard
item.description: Insecure storage of sensitive information in ABB Device Library Wizard versions 6.0.X, 6.0.3.1 and 6.0.3.2 allows unauthenticated low privilege user to read file that contains confidential data

item.title: CVE-2020-24676|2024-08-04T15:19:09.298Z -- abb -- abb%20ability%E2%84%A2%20symphony%C2%AE%20plus%20operations
item.description: In Symphony Plus Operations and Symphony Plus Historian, some services can be vulnerable to privilege escalation attacks. An unprivileged (but authenticated) user could execute arbitrary code and result in privilege escalation, depending on the user that the service runs as.

item.title: CVE-2020-8484|2024-08-04T10:03:45.932Z -- abb -- 800xa%20for%20dci
item.description: Insufficient protection of the inter-process communication functions in ABB System 800xA for DCI (all published versions) enables an attacker authenticated on the local system to inject data, allowing reads and writes to the controllers or cause windows processes to crash.

item.title: CVE-2020-8481|2024-08-04T10:03:45.868Z -- abb -- central%20licensing%20system
item.description: For ABB products ABB Ability™ System 800xA and related system extensions versions 5.1, 6.0 and 6.1, Compact HMI versions 5.1 and 6.0, Control Builder Safe 1.0, 1.1 and 2.0, Symphony Plus -S+ Operations 3.0 to 3.2 Symphony Plus -S+ Engineering 1.1 to 2.2, Composer Harmony 5.1, 6.0 and 6.1, Melody Composer 5.3, 6.1/6.2 and SPE for Melody 1.0SPx (Composer 6.3), Harmony OPC Server (HAOPC) Standalone 6.0, 6.1 and 7.0, ABB Ability™ System 800xA/ Advant® OCS Control Builder A 1.3 and 1.4, Advant® OCS AC100 OPC Server 5.1, 6.0 and 6.1, Composer CTK 6.1 and 6.2, AdvaBuild 3.7 SP1 and SP2, OPCServer for MOD 300 (non-800xA) 1.4, OPC Data Link 2.1 and 2.2, Knowledge Manager 8.0, 9.0 and 9.1, Manufacturing Operations Management 1812 and 1909, confidential data is written in an unprotected file. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could take full control of the computer.

item.title: CVE-2020-24686|2024-08-04T15:19:09.305Z -- abb -- ac500%20v2%20products%20with%20onboard%20ethernet
item.description: The vulnerabilities can be exploited to cause the web visualization component of the PLC to stop and not respond, leading to genuine users losing remote visibility of the PLC state. If a user attempts to login to the PLC while this vulnerability is exploited, the PLC will show an error state and refuse connections to Automation Builder. The execution of the PLC application is not affected by this vulnerability. This issue affects ABB AC500 V2 products with onboard Ethernet.

item.title: CVE-2020-8474|2024-08-04T10:03:44.868Z -- abb -- system%20800xa%20base
item.description: Weak Registry permissions in ABB System 800xA Base allow low privileged users to read and modify registry settings related to control system functionality, allowing an authenticated attacker to cause system functions to stop or malfunction.

item.title: CVE-2020-24679|2024-08-04T15:19:09.203Z -- abb -- abb%20ability%E2%84%A2%20symphony%C2%AE%20plus%20operations
item.description: A S+ Operations and S+ Historian service is subject to a DoS by special crafted messages. An attacker might use this flaw to make it crash or even execute arbitrary code on the machine where the service is hosted.

item.title: CVE-2020-10288|2024-08-04T10:58:39.980Z -- abb -- irb140
item.description: IRC5 exposes an ftp server (port 21). Upon attempting to gain access you are challenged with a request of username and password, however you can input whatever you like. As long as the field isn't empty it will be accepted.

item.title: CVE-2020-8475|2024-08-04T10:03:44.814Z -- abb -- central%20licensing%20system
item.description: For the Central Licensing Server component used in ABB products ABB Ability™ System 800xA and related system extensions versions 5.1, 6.0 and 6.1, Compact HMI versions 5.1 and 6.0, Control Builder Safe 1.0, 1.1 and 2.0, Symphony Plus -S+ Operations 3.0 to 3.2 Symphony Plus -S+ Engineering 1.1 to 2.2, Composer Harmony 5.1, 6.0 and 6.1, Melody Composer 5.3, 6.1/6.2 and SPE for Melody 1.0SPx (Composer 6.3), Harmony OPC Server (HAOPC) Standalone 6.0, 6.1 and 7.0, ABB Ability™ System 800xA/ Advant® OCS Control Builder A 1.3 and 1.4, Advant® OCS AC100 OPC Server 5.1, 6.0 and 6.1, Composer CTK 6.1 and 6.2, AdvaBuild 3.7 SP1 and SP2, OPCServer for MOD 300 (non-800xA) 1.4, OPC Data Link 2.1 and 2.2, Knowledge Manager 8.0, 9.0 and 9.1, Manufacturing Operations Management 1812 and 1909, ABB AbilityTM SCADAvantage versions 5.1 to 5.6.5, a weakness in validation of input exists that allows an attacker to block license handling by sending specially crafted messages to the CLS web service.

item.title: CVE-2020-8476|2024-08-04T10:03:45.851Z -- abb -- central%20licensing%20system
item.description: For the Central Licensing Server component used in ABB products ABB Ability™ System 800xA and related system extensions versions 5.1, 6.0 and 6.1, Compact HMI versions 5.1 and 6.0, Control Builder Safe 1.0, 1.1 and 2.0, Symphony Plus -S+ Operations 3.0 to 3.2 Symphony Plus -S+ Engineering 1.1 to 2.2, Composer Harmony 5.1, 6.0 and 6.1, Melody Composer 5.3, 6.1/6.2 and SPE for Melody 1.0SPx (Composer 6.3), Harmony OPC Server (HAOPC) Standalone 6.0, 6.1 and 7.0, ABB Ability™ System 800xA/ Advant® OCS Control Builder A 1.3 and 1.4, Advant® OCS AC100 OPC Server 5.1, 6.0 and 6.1, Composer CTK 6.1 and 6.2, AdvaBuild 3.7 SP1 and SP2, OPCServer for MOD 300 (non-800xA) 1.4, OPC Data Link 2.1 and 2.2, Knowledge Manager 8.0, 9.0 and 9.1, Manufacturing Operations Management 1812 and 1909, ABB AbilityTM SCADAvantage versions 5.1 to 5.6.5, a weakness in validation of input exists that allows an attacker to alter licenses assigned to the system nodes by sending specially crafted messages to the CLS web service.

item.title: CVE-2020-8479|2024-08-04T10:03:44.804Z -- abb -- central%20licensing%20system
item.description: For the Central Licensing Server component used in ABB products ABB Ability™ System 800xA and related system extensions versions 5.1, 6.0 and 6.1, Compact HMI versions 5.1 and 6.0, Control Builder Safe 1.0, 1.1 and 2.0, Symphony Plus -S+ Operations 3.0 to 3.2 Symphony Plus -S+ Engineering 1.1 to 2.2, Composer Harmony 5.1, 6.0 and 6.1, Melody Composer 5.3, 6.1/6.2 and SPE for Melody 1.0SPx (Composer 6.3), Harmony OPC Server (HAOPC) Standalone 6.0, 6.1 and 7.0, ABB Ability™ System 800xA/ Advant® OCS Control Builder A 1.3 and 1.4, Advant® OCS AC100 OPC Server 5.1, 6.0 and 6.1, Composer CTK 6.1 and 6.2, AdvaBuild 3.7 SP1 and SP2, OPCServer for MOD 300 (non-800xA) 1.4, OPC Data Link 2.1 and 2.2, Knowledge Manager 8.0, 9.0 and 9.1, Manufacturing Operations Management 1812 and 1909, ABB AbilityTM SCADAvantage versions 5.1 to 5.6.5. an XML External Entity Injection vulnerability exists that allows an attacker to read or call arbitrary files from the license server and/or from the network and also block the license handling.

item.title: CVE-2020-24677|2024-08-04T15:19:09.266Z -- abb -- abb%20ability%E2%84%A2%20symphony%C2%AE%20plus%20operations
item.description: Vulnerabilities in the S+ Operations and S+ Historian web applications can lead to a possible code execution and privilege escalation, redirect the user somewhere else or download unwanted data.

item.title: CVE-2020-8471|2024-08-04T10:03:44.886Z -- abb -- central%20licensing%20system
item.description: For the Central Licensing Server component used in ABB products ABB Ability™ System 800xA and related system extensions versions 5.1, 6.0 and 6.1, Compact HMI versions 5.1 and 6.0, Control Builder Safe 1.0, 1.1 and 2.0, Symphony Plus -S+ Operations 3.0 to 3.2 Symphony Plus -S+ Engineering 1.1 to 2.2, Composer Harmony 5.1, 6.0 and 6.1, Melody Composer 5.3, 6.1/6.2 and SPE for Melody 1.0SPx (Composer 6.3), Harmony OPC Server (HAOPC) Standalone 6.0, 6.1 and 7.0, ABB Ability™ System 800xA/ Advant® OCS Control Builder A 1.3 and 1.4, Advant® OCS AC100 OPC Server 5.1, 6.0 and 6.1, Composer CTK 6.1 and 6.2, AdvaBuild 3.7 SP1 and SP2, OPCServer for MOD 300 (non-800xA) 1.4, OPC Data Link 2.1 and 2.2, Knowledge Manager 8.0, 9.0 and 9.1, Manufacturing Operations Management 1812 and 1909, weak file permissions allow an authenticated attacker to block the license handling, escalate his/her privileges and execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2020-8488|2024-08-04T10:03:44.822Z -- abb -- 800xa%20batch%20management
item.description: Insufficient protection of the inter-process communication functions in ABB System 800xA Batch Management (all published versions) enables an attacker authenticated on the local system to inject data, affecting User Interface update during batch execution and/or compare/printing functionalities.

item.title: CVE-2020-24680|2024-08-04T15:19:09.226Z -- abb -- abb%20ability%E2%84%A2%20symphony%C2%AE%20plus%20operations
item.description: In S+ Operations and S+ Historian, the passwords of internal users (not Windows Users) are encrypted but improperly stored in a database.

item.title: CVE-2020-24683|2024-08-04T15:19:09.118Z -- abb -- abb%20ability%E2%84%A2%20symphony%C2%AE%20plus%20operations
item.description: The affected versions of S+ Operations (version 2.1 SP1 and earlier) used an approach for user authentication which relies on validation at the client node (client-side authentication). This is not as secure as having the server validate a client application before allowing a connection. Therefore, if the network communication or endpoints for these applications are not protected, unauthorized actors can bypass authentication and make unauthorized connections to the server application.

item.title: CVE-2020-8487|2024-08-04T10:03:45.974Z -- abb -- system%20800xa%20base
item.description: Insufficient protection of the inter-process communication functions in ABB System 800xA Base (all published versions) enables an attacker authenticated on the local system to inject data, affect node redundancy handling.

item.title: CVE-2020-8472|2024-08-04T10:03:45.938Z -- abb -- opc%20server%20for%20ac%20800m
item.description: Insufficient folder permissions used by system functions in ABB System 800xA products OPCServer for AC800M (versions 6.0 and earlier) and Control Builder M Professional, MMSServer for AC800M, Base Software for SoftControl (version 6.1 and earlier) allow low privileged users to read, modify, add and delete system and application files. An authenticated attacker who successfully exploited the vulnerabilities could escalate his/her privileges, cause system functions to stop and to corrupt user applications.

item.title: CVE-2020-10287|2024-08-04T10:58:39.753Z -- abb -- irb140
item.description: The IRC5 family with UAS service enabled comes by default with credentials that can be found on publicly available manuals. ABB considers this a well documented functionality that helps customer set up however, out of our research, we found multiple production systems running these exact default credentials and consider thereby this an exposure that should be mitigated. Moreover, future deployments should consider that these defaults should be forbidden (user should be forced to change them).

item.title: CVE-2020-24672|2024-08-04T15:19:08.954Z -- abb -- base%20software%20for%20softcontrol
item.description: A vulnerability in Base Software for SoftControl allows an attacker to insert and run arbitrary code in a computer running the affected product. This issue affects: .

item.title: CVE-2019-5620|2024-08-04T20:01:51.913Z -- abb -- microscada%20pro%20sys600
item.description: ABB MicroSCADA Pro SYS600 version 9.3 suffers from an instance of CWE-306: Missing Authentication for Critical Function.

item.title: CVE-2020-24678|2024-08-04T15:19:09.258Z -- abb -- abb%20ability%E2%84%A2%20symphony%C2%AE%20plus%20operations
item.description: An authenticated user might execute malicious code under the user context and take control of the system. S+ Operations or S+ Historian database is affected by multiple vulnerabilities such as the possibility to allow remote authenticated users to gain high privileges.

item.title: CVE-2020-24673|2024-08-04T15:19:08.908Z -- abb -- abb%20ability%E2%84%A2%20symphony%C2%AE%20plus%20operations
item.description: In S+ Operations and S+ Historian, a successful SQL injection exploit can read sensitive data from the database, modify database data (Insert/Update/Delete), execute administration operations on the database (such as shutdown the DBMS), recover the content of a given file present on the DBMS file system and in some cases issue commands to the operating system. This can lead to a loss of confidentiality and data integrity or even affect the product behavior and its availability.

item.title: CVE-2020-8473|2024-08-04T10:03:44.806Z -- abb -- system%20800xa%20base
item.description: Insufficient folder permissions used by system functions in ABB System 800xA Base (version 6.1 and earlier) allow low privileged users to read, modify, add and delete system and application files. An authenticated attacker who successfully exploit the vulnerabilities could escalate his/her privileges, cause system functions to stop and to corrupt user applications.

item.title: CVE-2020-24674|2024-08-04T15:19:08.898Z -- abb -- abb%20ability%E2%84%A2%20symphony%C2%AE%20plus%20operations
item.description: In S+ Operations and S+ Historian, not all client commands correctly check user permission as expected. Authenticated but Unauthorized remote users could execute a Denial-of-Service (DoS) attack, execute arbitrary code, or obtain more privilege than intended on the machines.

item.title: CVE-2020-8477|2024-08-04T10:03:46.221Z -- abb -- system%20800xa%20information%20manager
item.description: The installations for ABB System 800xA Information Manager versions 5.1, 6.0 to 6.0.3.2 and 6.1 wrongly contain an auxiliary component. An attacker is able to use this for an XSS-like attack to an authenticated local user, which might lead to execution of arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2020-24675|2024-08-04T15:19:08.688Z -- abb -- abb%20ability%E2%84%A2%20symphony%C2%AE%20plus%20operations
item.description: In S+ Operations and S+ History, it is possible that an unauthenticated user could inject values to the Operations History server (or standalone S+ History server) and ultimately write values to the controlled process.

item.title: CVE-2020-8489|2024-08-04T10:03:45.932Z -- abb -- 800xa%20information%20management
item.description: Insufficient protection of the inter-process communication functions in ABB System 800xA Information Management (all published versions) enables an attacker authenticated on the local system to inject data, affecting the runtime values to be stored in the archive, or making Information Management history services unavailable.

item.title: CVE-2020-8486|2024-08-04T10:03:46.229Z -- abb -- 800xa%20rnrp
item.description: Insufficient protection of the inter-process communication functions in ABB System 800xA RNRP (all published versions) enables an attacker authenticated on the local system to inject data, affect node redundancy handling.

item.title: CVE-2020-8485|2024-08-04T10:03:46.099Z -- abb -- 800xa%20for%20mod300
item.description: Insufficient protection of the inter-process communication functions in ABB System 800xA for MOD 300 (all published versions) enables an attacker authenticated on the local system to inject data, allowing reads and writes to the controllers or cause windows processes to crash.

item.title: CVE-2020-24685|2024-08-04T15:19:09.311Z -- abb -- ac500%20v2%20products%20with%20onboard%20ethernet
item.description: An unauthenticated specially crafted packet sent by an attacker over the network will cause a denial-of-service (DoS) vulnerability. Vulnerability allows attacker to stop the PLC. After stopping (ERR LED flashing red), physical access to the PLC is required in order to restart the application. This issue affects: ABB AC500 V2 products with onboard Ethernet version 2.8.4 and prior versions.

item.title: CVE-2020-8478|2024-08-04T10:03:44.802Z -- abb -- opc%20server%20for%20ac%20800m
item.description: Insufficient protection of the inter-process communication functions in ABB System 800xA products OPC Server for AC 800M, MMS Server for AC 800M and Base Software for SoftControl (all published versions) enables an attacker authenticated on the local system to inject data, affecting the online view of runtime data shown in Control Builder.

item.title: CVE-2020-11639|2024-08-04T11:35:13.593Z -- abb -- advant%20mod%20300%20advabuild
item.description:
An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by injecting garbage data or specially crafted data. Depending on the data injected each process might be affected differently. The process could crash or cause communication issues on the affected node, effectively causing a denial-of-service attack. The attacker could tamper with the data transmitted, causing the product to store wrong information or act on wrong data or display wrong information.
This issue affects Advant MOD 300 AdvaBuild: from 3.0 through 3.7 SP2.
For an attack to be successful, the attacker must have local access to a node in the system and be able to start a specially crafted application that disrupts the communication. An attacker who successfully exploited the vulnerability would be able to manipulate the data in such way as allowing reads and writes to the controllers or cause Windows processes in 800xA for MOD 300 and AdvaBuild to crash.

item.title: CVE-2020-11640|2024-08-04T11:35:13.681Z -- abb -- advant%20mod%20300%20advabuild
item.description:
AdvaBuild uses a command queue to launch certain operations. An attacker who gains access to the command queue can use it to launch an attack by running any executable on the AdvaBuild node. The executables that can be run are not limited to AdvaBuild specific executables.
Improper Privilege Management vulnerability in ABB Advant MOD 300 AdvaBuild.This issue affects Advant MOD 300 AdvaBuild: from 3.0 through 3.7 SP2.

item.title: CVE-2024-6209|2024-08-01T21:33:05.139Z -- abb -- aspect-enterprise
item.description:
Unauthorized file access in WEB Server in ABB ASPECT - Enterprise v <=3.08.01; NEXUS Series
v <=3.08.01
; MATRIX Series
v<=3.08.01 allows Attacker to access files unauthorized

item.title: CVE-2024-5402|2024-08-01T21:11:12.639Z -- abb -- mint%20workbench%20i
item.description:
Unquoted Search Path or Element vulnerability in ABB Mint Workbench.
A local attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could gain elevated privileges by inserting an executable file in the path of the affected service.
This issue affects Mint Workbench I versions: from 5866 before 5868.

item.title: CVE-2024-6298|2024-08-01T21:33:05.210Z -- abb -- aspect-enterprise
item.description: Improper Input Validation vulnerability in ABB ASPECT-Enterprise on Linux, ABB NEXUS Series on Linux, ABB MATRIX Series on Linux allows Remote Code Inclusion.This issue affects ASPECT-Enterprise: through 3.08.01; NEXUS Series: through 3.08.01; MATRIX Series: through 3.08.01.

item.title: CVE-2024-3036|2024-08-01T19:32:42.587Z -- abb -- 800xa%20base
item.description: Improper Input Validation vulnerability in ABB 800xA Base. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could cause services to crash by sending specifically crafted messages. This issue affects 800xA Base: from 6.0.0 through 6.1.1-2.

item.title: CVE-2024-0335|2024-07-29T14:31:30.849Z -- abb -- symphony%20plus%20s%2B%20operations
item.description:
ABB has internally identified a vulnerability in the ABB VPNI feature of the S+ Control API component which may be used by several Symphony Plus products (e.g., S+ Operations, S+ Engineering and S+ Analyst)
This issue affects Symphony Plus S+ Operations: from 3..0;0 through 3.3 SP1 RU4, from 2.1;0 through 2.1 SP2 RU3, from 2.0;0 through 2.0 SP6 TC6; Symphony Plus S+ Engineering: from 2.1 through 2.3 RU3; Symphony Plus S+ Analyst: from 7.0.0.0 through 7.2.0.2.

item.title: CVE-2020-11639|2024-07-23T19:10:57.887Z -- abb -- advant%20mod%20300%20advabuild
item.description:
An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by injecting garbage data or specially crafted data. Depending on the data injected each process might be affected differently. The process could crash or cause communication issues on the affected node, effectively causing a denial-of-service attack. The attacker could tamper with the data transmitted, causing the product to store wrong information or act on wrong data or display wrong information.
This issue affects Advant MOD 300 AdvaBuild: from 3.0 through 3.7 SP2.
For an attack to be successful, the attacker must have local access to a node in the system and be able to start a specially crafted application that disrupts the communication. An attacker who successfully exploited the vulnerability would be able to manipulate the data in such way as allowing reads and writes to the controllers or cause Windows processes in 800xA for MOD 300 and AdvaBuild to crash.

item.title: CVE-2024-5402|2024-07-15T13:10:14.877Z -- abb -- mint%20workbench%20i
item.description:
Unquoted Search Path or Element vulnerability in ABB Mint Workbench.
A local attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could gain elevated privileges by inserting an executable file in the path of the affected service.
This issue affects Mint Workbench I versions: from 5866 before 5868.

item.title: CVE-2024-6209|2024-07-05T17:24:44.098Z -- abb -- aspect-enterprise
item.description:
Unauthorized file access in WEB Server in ABB ASPECT - Enterprise v <=3.08.01; NEXUS Series
v <=3.08.01
; MATRIX Series
v<=3.08.01 allows Attacker to access files unauthorized

item.title: CVE-2024-6298|2024-07-05T17:24:03.161Z -- abb -- aspect-enterprise
item.description: Improper Input Validation vulnerability in ABB ASPECT-Enterprise on Linux, ABB NEXUS Series on Linux, ABB MATRIX Series on Linux allows Remote Code Inclusion.This issue affects ASPECT-Enterprise: through 3.08.01; NEXUS Series: through 3.08.01; MATRIX Series: through 3.08.01.

item.title: CVE-2024-4007|2024-07-03T14:13:05.048Z -- abb -- aspect%20enterprise%20%28asp-ent-x%29
item.description: Default credential in install package in ABB ASPECT; NEXUS Series; MATRIX Series version 3.07 allows attacker to login to product instances wrongly configured.

item.title: CVE-2024-3036|2024-06-22T16:40:36.032Z -- abb -- 800xa%20base
item.description: Improper Input Validation vulnerability in ABB 800xA Base. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could cause services to crash by sending specifically crafted messages. This issue affects 800xA Base: from 6.0.0 through 6.1.1-2.

item.title: CVE-2024-1913|2024-06-04T18:00:16.786Z -- abb -- robotware%206
item.description:
An attacker who successfully exploited these vulnerabilities could cause the robot to stop, make the robot controller inaccessible, or execute arbitrary code.
The vulnerability could potentially be exploited to perform unauthorized actions by an attacker. This vulnerability arises under specific condition when specially crafted message is processed by the system.
Below are reported vulnerabilities in the Robot Ware versions.
* IRC5- RobotWare 6 < 6.15.06 except 6.10.10, and 6.13.07 * OmniCore- RobotWare 7 < 7.14

item.title: CVE-2024-1914|2024-06-06T13:17:40.400Z -- abb -- robotware%206
item.description:
An attacker who successfully exploited these vulnerabilities could cause the robot to stop, make the robot controller inaccessible.
The vulnerability could potentially be exploited to perform unauthorized actions by an attacker. This vulnerability arises under specific condition when specially crafted message is processed by the system.
Below are reported vulnerabilities in the Robot Ware versions.
* IRC5- RobotWare 6 < 6.15.06 except 6.10.10, and 6.13.07 * OmniCore- RobotWare 7 < 7.14

item.title: CVE-2024-0335|2024-04-03T18:53:25.236Z -- abb -- symphony%20plus%20s%2B%20operations
item.description:
ABB has internally identified a vulnerability in the ABB VPNI feature of the S+ Control API component which may be used by several Symphony Plus products (e.g., S+ Operations, S+ Engineering and S+ Analyst)
This issue affects Symphony Plus S+ Operations: from 3..0;0 through 3.3 SP1 RU4, from 2.1;0 through 2.1 SP2 RU3, from 2.0;0 through 2.0 SP6 TC6; Symphony Plus S+ Engineering: from 2.1 through 2.3 RU3; Symphony Plus S+ Analyst: from 7.0.0.0 through 7.2.0.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-3036|2024-06-21T10:26:30.550Z -- abb -- 800xa%20base
item.description: Improper Input Validation vulnerability in ABB 800xA Base. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could cause services to crash by sending specifically crafted messages. This issue affects 800xA Base: from 6.0.0 through 6.1.1-2.

item.title: CVE-2024-4007|2024-07-01T12:06:53.048Z -- abb -- aspect%20enterprise%20%28asp-ent-x%29
item.description: Default credential in install package in ABB ASPECT; NEXUS Series; MATRIX Series version 3.07 allows attacker to login to product instances wrongly configured.

item.title: CVE-2024-6298|2024-07-05T11:11:43.061Z -- abb -- aspect-enterprise
item.description: Improper Input Validation vulnerability in ABB ASPECT-Enterprise on Linux, ABB NEXUS Series on Linux, ABB MATRIX Series on Linux allows Remote Code Inclusion.This issue affects ASPECT-Enterprise: through 3.08.01; NEXUS Series: through 3.08.01; MATRIX Series: through 3.08.01.

item.title: CVE-2024-6209|2024-07-05T11:10:05.458Z -- abb -- aspect-enterprise
item.description:
Unauthorized file access in WEB Server in ABB ASPECT - Enterprise v <=3.08.01; NEXUS Series
v <=3.08.01
; MATRIX Series
v<=3.08.01 allows Attacker to access files unauthorized

item.title: CVE-2024-5402|2024-07-15T11:57:44.261Z -- abb -- mint%20workbench%20i
item.description:
Unquoted Search Path or Element vulnerability in ABB Mint Workbench.
A local attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could gain elevated privileges by inserting an executable file in the path of the affected service.
This issue affects Mint Workbench I versions: from 5866 before 5868.

item.title: CVE-2020-11640|2024-07-23T17:36:51.458Z -- abb -- advant%20mod%20300%20advabuild
item.description:
AdvaBuild uses a command queue to launch certain operations. An attacker who gains access to the command queue can use it to launch an attack by running any executable on the AdvaBuild node. The executables that can be run are not limited to AdvaBuild specific executables.
Improper Privilege Management vulnerability in ABB Advant MOD 300 AdvaBuild.This issue affects Advant MOD 300 AdvaBuild: from 3.0 through 3.7 SP2.

item.title: CVE-2020-11639|2024-07-23T17:26:55.489Z -- abb -- advant%20mod%20300%20advabuild
item.description:
An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by injecting garbage data or specially crafted data. Depending on the data injected each process might be affected differently. The process could crash or cause communication issues on the affected node, effectively causing a denial-of-service attack. The attacker could tamper with the data transmitted, causing the product to store wrong information or act on wrong data or display wrong information.
This issue affects Advant MOD 300 AdvaBuild: from 3.0 through 3.7 SP2.
For an attack to be successful, the attacker must have local access to a node in the system and be able to start a specially crafted application that disrupts the communication. An attacker who successfully exploited the vulnerability would be able to manipulate the data in such way as allowing reads and writes to the controllers or cause Windows processes in 800xA for MOD 300 and AdvaBuild to crash.

item.title: CVE-2020-11640|2024-07-24T19:00:53.120Z -- abb -- advant%20mod%20300%20advabuild
item.description:
AdvaBuild uses a command queue to launch certain operations. An attacker who gains access to the command queue can use it to launch an attack by running any executable on the AdvaBuild node. The executables that can be run are not limited to AdvaBuild specific executables.
Improper Privilege Management vulnerability in ABB Advant MOD 300 AdvaBuild.This issue affects Advant MOD 300 AdvaBuild: from 3.0 through 3.7 SP2.

item.title: CVE-2024-1914|2024-08-01T18:56:22.492Z -- abb -- robotware%206
item.description:
An attacker who successfully exploited these vulnerabilities could cause the robot to stop, make the robot controller inaccessible.
The vulnerability could potentially be exploited to perform unauthorized actions by an attacker. This vulnerability arises under specific condition when specially crafted message is processed by the system.
Below are reported vulnerabilities in the Robot Ware versions.
* IRC5- RobotWare 6 < 6.15.06 except 6.10.10, and 6.13.07 * OmniCore- RobotWare 7 < 7.14

item.title: CVE-2024-1913|2024-08-01T18:56:22.392Z -- abb -- robotware%206
item.description:
An attacker who successfully exploited these vulnerabilities could cause the robot to stop, make the robot controller inaccessible, or execute arbitrary code.
The vulnerability could potentially be exploited to perform unauthorized actions by an attacker. This vulnerability arises under specific condition when specially crafted message is processed by the system.
Below are reported vulnerabilities in the Robot Ware versions.
* IRC5- RobotWare 6 < 6.15.06 except 6.10.10, and 6.13.07 * OmniCore- RobotWare 7 < 7.14

item.title: CVE-2024-0335|2024-08-01T18:04:49.016Z -- abb -- symphony%20plus%20s%2B%20operations
item.description:
ABB has internally identified a vulnerability in the ABB VPNI feature of the S+ Control API component which may be used by several Symphony Plus products (e.g., S+ Operations, S+ Engineering and S+ Analyst)
This issue affects Symphony Plus S+ Operations: from 3..0;0 through 3.3 SP1 RU4, from 2.1;0 through 2.1 SP2 RU3, from 2.0;0 through 2.0 SP6 TC6; Symphony Plus S+ Engineering: from 2.1 through 2.3 RU3; Symphony Plus S+ Analyst: from 7.0.0.0 through 7.2.0.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-4007|2024-08-01T20:26:57.247Z -- abb -- aspect%20enterprise%20%28asp-ent-x%29
item.description: Default credential in install package in ABB ASPECT; NEXUS Series; MATRIX Series version 3.07 allows attacker to login to product instances wrongly configured.
